title: Robust Finetuning of Vision-Language-Action Robot Policies via Parameter Merging
summary: Generalist robot policies, trained on large and diverse datasets, have demonstrated the ability to generalize across a wide spectrum of behaviors, enabling a single policy to act in varied real-world environments. However, they still fall short on new tasks not covered in the training data.
